name: Lobodestroyo - Rareware inspired 3D Action Platformer Game
blurb: A retro action adventure game inspired by N64-era collect-a-thon platformers. Channeling the spirit of Rareware's late 90's titles.

rewards.reward: MEMBERS ONLY ACCESS + DIGITAL GRAB-BAG ==============================  Unlocked access to the Members Only section of the Lobodestroyo.com site and developers forums. A digital grab-bag of icons and downloadable desktop / smartphone art, ringtones and other goodies.

EARLY GAME DOWNLOAD ==============================  A digital copy of the game before the retail release on your choice of launch platform. All access to digital grab-bag and Members Only section of the Developer Forums.

BACKER CREDIT + GAME ============================== A digital copy of the game before the retail release on your choice of launch platform. Your name will appear at the end of the game\u2019s credits in the \u2018Backers\u2019 section and on the official website. Unlocked access to the Members Only section of Lobodestroyo Developer Forums and digital grab-bag.

NAME IN THE GAME (VIP LEVEL) ============================== Your name will be featured in the form of an in-game texture with other backers! Emailed instructions contain directions on where to find your name along with our eternal thanks. Unlocked exclusive Backer-Only area in the game: 'Da Club'. Includes all EARLY GAME DOWNLOAD-Tier rewards!

NAME IN THE GAME (PRESIDENTIAL LEVEL) ============================== Your name will be featured in the form of a more prominent in-game texture by itself! Emailed instructions contain directions on where to find your name along with our eternal thanks. Unlocked exclusive Backer-Only area in the game: 'Presidential Suite' (+'Da Club')  Includes all EARLY GAME DOWNLOAD-Tier rewards!

NAME IN THE GAME (PRIVATE ISLAND LEVEL) ============================== Your name will be immortalized in the form of a very prominent in-game texture by itself! Emailed instructions contain directions on where to find your name along with our eternal thanks. Unlocked exclusive Backer-Only area in the game: 'Private Island' (+'Da Club' and 'Presidential Suite'. Includes all EARLY GAME DOWNLOAD-Tier rewards!

LOBODESTROYO GAME PAK ============================== A physical Lobodestroyo game pak collectable containing a download code for your copy of the game. Plus all rewards, access and name features in the NAME IN THE GAME (PRIVATE ISLAND LEVEL) tier.

SIGNED 'DORADO EDITION' GAME PAK ============================== A special golden physical Lobodestroyo game pak collectable, signed by the Lobodestroyo team, containing a download code for your copy of the game. Plus all rewards, access and name features in the NAME IN THE GAME (PRIVATE ISLAND LEVEL) tier.

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER CREDIT + 'DORADO EDITION' GAME PAK ============================== Executive Producer credit in the game credits reserved for top-tier backers like yourself and your characterized image and name featured on the in-game on the Founder's Wall for everyone to see (and speak very highly of). Plus your own signed \u2018Dorado Edition\u2019 Game Pak and all associated in-game rewards and Developer Forum access that goes along with it.

MODEL CITIZEN TREATMENT ============================== Your likeness will be crafted into one of the hub world citizens as an in-game NPC!  Your character will be referred to by name in conversation as well as your characterized photo appearing on the Founder's Wall. All rewards granted in the EXECUTIVE PRODUCER reward tier are also included along with the satisfaction of knowing that you are one of the most generous and attractive backers on the internet.

OUR SAVIOR ============================== Help save Lobo in it's final hours! Perfect for a business looking to make an impact on the game! Rewards include: Custom in-game billboard with your message/ad. Hub world museum wing dedication. Exclusive Golden Mutt alternate costume code (sharable).10 Dorado Edition signed Game Paks (all with full access to all backer-only areas). Custom 27"x40" artwork signed and framed by the team. In-game NPC character complete with yacht which you get to name. Plus Executive Producer Credit. (Please see our special UPDATE for full details on this limited tier!!)
